Class ProductController

java.lang.Object
com.ecomweb.online.da.DA.controller.ProductController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/products") public class ProductController extends Object
Controller class for managing product-related REST API endpoints. Handles CRUD operations for products.

  • Method Details

    • getAllProducts

      @GetMapping @ResponseBody public Collection<Product> getAllProducts()
      Retrieves all available products.
      Returns:
      A collection of all products.

    • addProduct

      @PostMapping @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Product> addProduct(@RequestBody Product product)
      Adds a new product to the database.
      Parameters:
      product - The product to be added.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the added product.

    • updateProduct

      @PutMapping @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Product> updateProduct(@RequestBody Product product)
      Updates an existing product.
      Parameters:
      product - The updated product details.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the updated product.

    • getProductsByName

      @GetMapping("/name/{name}") @ResponseBody public List<Product> getProductsByName(@PathVariable String name)
      Retrieves products by their name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the product to search.
      Returns:
      A list of products matching the specified name.

    • getProductsByType

      @GetMapping("/type/{type}") @ResponseBody public List<Product> getProductsByType(@PathVariable String type)
      Retrieves products by their type.
      Parameters:
      type - The type of the product to search.
      Returns:
      A list of products matching the specified type.

    • getProductsBySize

      @GetMapping("/size/{size}") @ResponseBody public List<Product> getProductsBySize(@PathVariable String size)
      Retrieves products by their size.
      Parameters:
      size - The size of the product to search.
      Returns:
      A list of products matching the specified size.

    • getProductsByColor

      @GetMapping("/color/{color}") @ResponseBody public List<Product> getProductsByColor(@PathVariable String color)
      Retrieves products by their color.
      Parameters:
      color - The color of the product to search.
      Returns:
      A list of products matching the specified color.
